name: Pixland
description:
Game developed by YuSe for the GBJAM 2016.

Jump: space bar, z, n

Fire: ctrl, x, m

Navigate: clic or arrows

Made in less than a week and only using 4 colors.

Pixland was a paradise, but one day something happen and then the shadows cover all the land.

Just one man was inmune to the darkness and it is his duty collect all 6 flames to lit the great lighthouse once again and save his world.
